mean_cn: n. 姿势，装腔作势，伪装；  vi. 摆好姿态；  vt. 主张，提出，引起
mean_en: the position in which someone stands, sits, lies down, etc., especially as a model for a photograph, painting, etc.
word_etyma: pos放+e → 摆放造型 → pose 姿势
sentence: The beautiful model made a sexy pose for the camera.
sentence_trans: 这个漂亮的模特在镜头前摆出了一个性感的姿势。
